title: 3 Rookie Mistakes to Avoid with Python Lists
body:

 2. Changing List Size While Iterating

title: The 5 Programming Languages You'll Ever Need
body: Hey everyone! Programming is one of the best skillsets to have nowadays, but many people are unsure as to which programming language they should learn, so, let's take a look at 5 different programming languages that you'll probably ever need!

title: C# Foreach loop Tutorial & Tips
body:
Foreach loop is a type of loop that is quite similar to the for loop however, it is simpler and easier to use and is mostly used for simple tasks. 

 Foreach loop is a way to run a loop one time for each value in a certain list.
